item.title: Mexico's most wanted drug lord 'El Mencho' killed in military operation
item.description:
Mexico's most wanted drug lord 'El Mencho' killed in military operation 15 minutes ago Share Save Will Grant , Mexico correspondent and Jack Burgess Share Save US Department of State Nemesio Oseguera Cervantes, known as 'El Mencho', was leader of the Jalisco New Generation (CJNG) drug cartel Mexico's most wanted man and the leader of the feared Jalisco New Generation (CJNG) drug cartel has been killed during a security operation to arrest him, the country's...

item.title: Armed man killed after entering secure perimeter of Trump's residence, Secret Service says
item.description:
Armed man killed after entering secure perimeter of Trump's residence, Secret Service says 2 hours ago Share Save George Wright Share Save Getty Images An armed man has been shot dead after entering the secure perimeter of US President Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago residence in Florida, the Secret Service has said. The man was carrying a shotgun and fuel can when he was stopped and shot by Secret Service agents and a Sheriff's deputy, authorities said. The incident happened around...

item.title: Pakistan launches deadly strikes on Afghanistan
item.description:
Pakistan launches deadly strikes on Afghanistan 9 hours ago Share Save Ottilie Mitchell and Yama Bariz , BBC Afghan Share Save AFP via Getty Images Islamabad said the strikes were launched on Afghanistan following recent suicide bombings in Pakistan Pakistan has carried out multiple overnight air strikes on Afghanistan, which the Taliban has said killed at least 18 people, including women and children. Islamabad said the attacks targeted seven alleged militant camps and hideouts near the...

item.title: Bones of St Francis of Assisi go on public display in Italy
item.description:
Bones of St Francis of Assisi go on public display in Italy 3 hours ago Share Save Jack Burgess Share Save EPA The skeleton is being displayed in a nitrogen-filled plexiglass case in front of the altar at the lower church of Assisi's basilica The remains of Italy's patron saint, St Francis of Assisi, have gone on public display to mark 800 years since his death. Italian officials say about 400,000 people from around the world have reserved a place to see his bones in the central...

item.title: Trump curious why Iran has not 'capitulated', US envoy Witkoff says
item.description:
Trump curious why Iran has not 'capitulated', US envoy Witkoff says 3 hours ago Share Save Jaroslav Lukiv and Ghoncheh Habibiazad , BBC Persian Share Save Reuters The US has been building up its military presence near Iran in recent weeks US President Donald Trump is questioning why Iran has not yet "capitulated" in the face of Washington's military build-up in the Middle East, the US president's special envoy Steve Witkoff has said. Witkoff told Fox News on Saturday that...

item.title: Greenland says 'no thanks' to Trump US hospital boat
item.description:
Greenland says 'no thanks' to Trump US hospital boat 4 hours ago Share Save Rachel Muller-Heyndyk Share Save Getty Images The US operates two dedicated hospital boats, including the USNS Mercy Greenland's prime minister has asked US President Donald Trump to talk to him instead of making "random outbursts on social media", after Trump said he was sending a US hospital boat to "take care" of people on the island. Trump wrote on Truth Social that he was going to send a boat filled.....

item.title: US ambassador's Israel comments condemned by Arab and Muslim nations
item.description:
US ambassador's Israel condemned by Arab and Muslim nations 10 hours ago Share Save Maia Davies Share Save Reuters Mike Huckabee, pictured in September, has long been a supporter of Israel Arab and Muslim governments have condemned remarks made by the US Ambassador to Israel, Mike Huckabee, who suggested Israel would be justified in taking over a vast stretch of the Middle East on Biblical grounds. In an interview with conservative US commentator Tucker Carlson, Huckabee was asked whether.....

item.title: Explosions kill police officer and injure 25 in western Ukraine
item.description:
Explosions kill police officer and injure 25 in western Ukraine 7 hours ago Share Save Maia Davies Share Save Anadolu via Getty Images Explosive devices were planted in waste bins, according to police A 23-year-old female police officer has been killed and 25 people injured in what Ukrainian officials have called a terror attack in the western city of Lviv. Two homemade explosive devices detonated after police crews responded to a reported break-in shortly after midnight on Sunday, the National....
